post:
VirtuallyDedicated is celebrating our 3 year anniversary with new GREAT offers featuring our OpenVZ cloud servers or our new Xen servers.

CURRENT SPECIAL
===========================================
SAVE30 Coupon - Save 30% for life for our 3 year anniversary
===========================================

CLOUD SERVERS featuring VPSGrid with OpenVZ
===========================================
What are our cloud servers?
VirtuallyDedicated cloud servers offer high availability failover and data mirroring. Meaning if one of our physical servers has a failure, requests are directed to a secondary server keeping your server accessible to all users. Never experience long periods of downtime or data loss due to hardware failures!

VC384 - 384MB RAM
1GB Burstable RAM
24GB Disk Space / 300GB Bandwidth
$7.69 per month with SAVE30

$11.89 per month with SAVE30

XEN SERVERS
===========================================

VirtuallyDedicated never oversells resources. We sell only 7.5GB of RAM per quad-core server on both Xen and OpenVZ. All of our servers are equiped with RAID.

How can we afford this pricing?
Simple, we surely aren't making much on this offer but we hope we can show some of you why we have made it 3 years and in turn a word of mouth can help guide us new customers in the future.

This special will NOT last long, so order quickly!
